items.sentence: Tom showed Mary the letter he had just written.
Tom picked up his toys and put them in the box.
Tom might go to the zoo with Mary next weekend.
Tom knew that he'd have to tell Mary the truth.
Tom is going to be in prison for several years.
Tom is going back to Australia on October 20th.
Tom has come back from Australia for Christmas.
Tom has already decided where he's going to go.
Tom didn't look very happy yesterday afternoon.
Tom didn't go to Boston last weekend with Mary.
